DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Child and Youth Resilience Measure Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Having to do with children._A questionnaire designed as a screening tool to explore the resources (individual, relational, communal, and cultural) available to individuals, that may bolster their resilience. Versions are available as Child, designed for ages five through nine years old and Youth, designed for ages ten through 23 years old._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
